
ecis_to_htmls(++LibDirs, ++HtmlTopDir, ++LinkBack)

   Generate an HTML documentation tree for the given library directories

Arguments
   LibDirs             A list of directory path names
   HtmlTopDir          A directory path name
   LinkBack            HTML string (may be empty)

Type
   library(document)

Description
See ecis_to_htmls/4 for details

See Also
   ecis_to_htmls / 4, ecis_to_htmls / 0
